https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A5RMlR6MgZEIcfcGuXe4JGs71G0.jpg Set in Thailand, between April-June 1999, 'A Moment In June' is a story of the fusion of six lives, a song that links them together, a hope of the second chance that might never come and a moment they all need to make a life-changing decision. A Moment in June
